member.name: D2D1_STROKE_STYLE_PROPERTIES
member.summary: Describes the stroke that outlines a shape.

member.name: D2D1_STROKE_STYLE_PROPERTIES.startCap
member.summary: The cap applied to the start of all the open figures in a stroked geometry.

member.name: D2D1_STROKE_STYLE_PROPERTIES.endCap
member.summary: The cap applied to the end of all the open figures in a stroked geometry.

member.name: D2D1_STROKE_STYLE_PROPERTIES.dashCap
member.summary: The shape at either end of each dash segment.

member.name: D2D1_STROKE_STYLE_PROPERTIES.lineJoin
member.summary: A value that describes how segments are joined. This value is ignored for a vertex if the segment flags specify that the segment should have a smooth join.

member.name: D2D1_STROKE_STYLE_PROPERTIES.miterLimit
member.summary: The limit of the thickness of the join on a mitered corner. This value is always treated as though it is greater than or equal to 1.0f.

member.name: D2D1_STROKE_STYLE_PROPERTIES.dashStyle
member.summary: A value that specifies whether the stroke has a dash pattern and, if so, the dash style.

member.name: D2D1_STROKE_STYLE_PROPERTIES.dashOffset
member.summary: A value that specifies an offset in the dash sequence. A positive dash offset value shifts the dash pattern, in units of stroke width, toward the start of the stroked geometry. A negative dash offset value shifts the dash pattern, in units of stroke width, toward the end of the stroked geometry.
